revised_title: Boghead Coal Destructive Distillation Products and Hydrocarbon Analysis
tldr: The author examines the products of destructive distillation of Boghead coal and analyzes the hydrocarbons present. They discovered a group of hydrocarbons resistant to certain acids and found that benzole and its homologues were formed during the process. The author also studied the brominated oil and its derivatives, providing insights into the chemical composition and reactions of the substances.
